summary:
Gods & Monsters
 Potterverse | 1950 | Riddle Era | 1 yr.

 Have you ever wanted to be a big player in the game of life? Ever...
caption:
Gods & Monsters

Potterverse | 1950 | Riddle Era | 1 yr.

Have you ever wanted to be a big player in the game of life? Ever wanted to ride the robe-tails of someone who is literally burning their pathway to the top? Have you ever wanted to walk along side the Dark Lordand feel the power that radiates from his very core? Have you wanted all these things, but froze because you felt you might not make the cut?

Gods & Monsters encourages you to join us during our Christmas Event in the Atrium, where we have six temporary characters available for you to try on for size. 

We look forward to seeing you.

Trying to write fics. Failing miserably. Basically shitposts. 
Eighteen. Female.   Masterlist  (if the link doesn't work, just search "masterlist". I think it should show up!)

summary: A/N: Ok,, so I thought I'd make a masterlist afterall, since I plan on improving and writing as much as I can. I try to write...
body:
Masterlist

A/N: Ok,, so I thought I’d make a masterlist afterall, since I plan on improving and writing as much as I can. I try to write for the MCU universe, Harry Potter (I’ll post a fic sooner or later, I promise!), Narnia (again, I promise! Sooner or later), Percy Jackson (I need to read the books again bc I miss them so much but I will surely write fics for them), Attack on Titan/Shingeki no Kyojin (THERE. AREN’T.ENOUGH. LEVI. FICS.)

(tags will keep changing as I add fics)

Steve Rogers

How The World Works (Soulmate AU) -written for Ariel’s 4K challenge.

(more to come soon!)

blog.name: those-hero-kids
blog.title: Shit Of Mine
blog.description: A blog in which I post my ideas for different fandoms and shit. Enjoy

tags: god i love her so much
body:
Madonna

I don’t usually post to Tumblr, so I decided to sorta go on about something here instead of my Instagram story.


My mom is the reason I love Madonna. She’d always play her songs on the long and many car trips we’ve had and they’d be stuck in my head for hours. Now, whenever there’s a Madonna song on the radio, I flip out and get really into it because damn, her music is so great.


But the reason for this post is that I’m writing a wolfstar raises Harry fic and I CANT INCLUDE MADONNA’S SONGS YET BECAUSE HER FIRST SONG WASN’T OUT UNTIL 1982 AND THE FIRST FEW CHAPTERS TAKE PLACE AFTER HALLOWEEN OF 1981 GAAAH.


But yeah, Sirius definitely liked Madonna—well, my Sirius anyway—and I’m definitely including her songs in my writing. Who knows, maybe Harry will like Madonna as well. Or maybe he’d be haunted by them? Remus would just be so done with Sirius and his Madonna craze and probably hate himself for showing him one of her songs.


Okay, it’s 2 am I should probably head off to bed. Night!
